code: @Override protected String doBuildCamelEndpointUri(String host, Integer port, String contextPath, String scheme) {     if (!ObjectHelper.equal(scheme, "undertow")) {         return super.doBuildCamelEndpointUri(host, port, contextPath, scheme).     }     String answer = scheme + ":http://" + host.     if (port != null) {         answer = answer + ":" + port.     }     if (contextPath != null) {         if (!contextPath.startsWith("/")) {             contextPath = "/" + contextPath.         }         answer += contextPath.     }     return answer. }
